titleInfo.title: Genetique de peche originel : le poids du passe sur l'avenir de la vie

mods.abstract: Combining science and meditation, author, Nobel Prize for Medicine and specialist in cellular life, tells the story of the evolution of current forms of life from a common ancestor. It then presents future scenarios and explains why they all lead to the extinction of life on Earth with the exception of one, one in which women take power.

titleInfo.title: Chistian De Duve papers, Rockefeller University Faculty Accession number: 2013:027 Box: 83
